fireblast.name: Fireblast
fireblast.description: Unleashes a blast of fire, dealing 5 damage to all enemies.

aegis.name: Minor Aegis
aegis.description: Creates a defensive barrier, increasing defense by 5.

iceblast.name: Iceblast
iceblast.description: Strikes a random enemy for 8 damage, stunning them.

lightningblast.name: Lightningblast
lightningblast.description: Strikes a random enemy for 12 damage.

push.name: Telekinetic Push
push.description: Pushes all enemies away from the hero, doing minor damage and stunning them.

shadow.name: Shadow Cloak
shadow.description: Bends shadow around the hero, making them harder to detect while sneaking.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Unleashes a massive fiery explosion, dealing 20 damage to all enemies and stunning them.
